name: Dextrys
overview:
Dextrys, Inc. provides product engineering and application services outsourcing services. The company offers embedded software development and maintenance; product release management; software redesigning and rewriting; product localization and translation; quality assurance and testing; and implementation support services. Additionally, it provides application and Web development; application modernization; and application outsourcing services. The company caters to software and hardware, insurance, financial services, health care, and telecommunications sectors.

Dextrys, formerly known as DarwinSuzsoft, was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Wakefield, Massachusetts with additional offices in Suzhou and Shanghai, China and Wanchai, Hong Kong.

funding_rounds.source_description: Francisco Partners' massive investment in DarwinSuzsoft is a ringing endorsement of the opportunities for software outsourcing and development in China.
